SELECT m.id, m.machine_code AS machineCode, CONCAT(area.province,area.city,area.district,IFNULL(l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,'')) AS locale, MAX( d.create_time ) AS firstTime, MIN( d.create_time ) AS lastTime FROM inno72_machine_locale_detail d LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = d.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = d.locale LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.CODE = l.area_code
and LEFT(l.area_code,#{num}) = LEFT(#{code},#{num})
AND (m.machine_code LIKE '%${keyword}%' or l.mall LIKE '%${keyword}%' or JSON_EXTRACT(l.tag, '$.tags') LIKE '%${keyword}%' or l.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.province LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.city LIKE '%${keyword}%' or area.district LIKE '%${keyword}%' )
GROUP BY d.machine_id

SELECT d.id, CONCAT(area.province,area.city,area.district,IFNULL(l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,'')) AS locale, CONCAT(oldArea.province,oldArea.city,oldArea.district,IFNULL(ol.mall,""),IFNULL( ol.name,'')) AS old_locale, d.create_time FROM inno72_machine_locale_detail d LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = d.locale LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.CODE = l.area_code LEFT JOIN inno72_locale ol ON ol.id = d.old_locale LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area oldArea ON oldArea.CODE = ol.area_code where d.machine_id=#{machineId} ORDER BY d.create_time DESC
